job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Machine Learning Engineer I - GENAI Studio
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Develop production-grade ML systems, from models to features and pipelines, accounting for reliability, scalability, real-time requirements, monitoring and retraining.
     * Build readable and reusable code, applying code quality best practices and using standard libraries.
     * Choose the right technology or coding methodology as well as refactor and simplify code when necessary.
     * Take full ownership of your services end to end by actively monitoring the systems health, performance and business impact.
     * Be responsible for business related data governance processes, the technical implementation and maintenance of data processing services and storage systems, and the implementation and maintenance of ML governance processes.
     * Evaluate possible architecture solutions taking into account the business and technology requirements.
     * Set the relevant service level objectives SLOs and act accordingly when they are not met.
     * Build readable and reusable code, using the right technologies and coding methodologies applying knowledge of business area tools and product needs.
     * Continuously evolve your craft by keeping up to date with the latest developments in ML/AI and related technologies and upskilling on these, as needed.
     * Contribute to the internal ML/AI community by sharing your knowledge and participating in our internal ML programs
     * Coach others through evidence and clear communication, explaining advanced technical concepts in simpler terms.
     * Maintain a highly cross-disciplinary perspective, solving issues by applying approaches and methods from across a variety of disciplines and related fields.
     * Achieve mutually agreeable solutions by staying adaptable, communicating ideas in clear coherent language and practising active listening
job_details.full_text:
Senior Machine Learning Engineer I - GENAI Studio

* Develop production-grade ML systems, from models to features and pipelines, accounting for reliability, scalability, real-time requirements, monitoring and retraining.
     * Build readable and reusable code, applying code quality best practices and using standard libraries.
     * Choose the right technology or coding methodology as well as refactor and simplify code when necessary.
     * Take full ownership of your services end to end by actively monitoring the systems health, performance and business impact.
     * Be responsible for business related data governance processes, the technical implementation and maintenance of data processing services and storage systems, and the implementation and maintenance of ML governance processes.
     * Evaluate possible architecture solutions taking into account the business and technology requirements.
     * Set the relevant service level objectives SLOs and act accordingly when they are not met.
     * Build readable and reusable code, using the right technologies and coding methodologies applying knowledge of business area tools and product needs.
     * Continuously evolve your craft by keeping up to date with the latest developments in ML/AI and related technologies and upskilling on these, as needed.
     * Contribute to the internal ML/AI community by sharing your knowledge and participating in our internal ML programs
     * Coach others through evidence and clear communication, explaining advanced technical concepts in simpler terms.
     * Maintain a highly cross-disciplinary perspective, solving issues by applying approaches and methods from across a variety of disciplines and related fields.
     * Achieve mutually agreeable solutions by staying adaptable, communicating ideas in clear coherent language and practising active listening

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing production-grade ML systems with a focus on reliability, scalability, and real-time requirements, which aligns with both ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer profiles. However, the mention of 'GENAI Studio' in the title, coupled with responsibilities like 'business related data governance processes', 'technical implementation and maintenance of data processing services and storage systems', and 'implementation and maintenance of ML governance processes', suggests a broader scope that includes building and maintaining systems around AI models. While not explicitly mentioning LLMs or RAG, the context of a 'GENAI Studio' and the focus on end-to-end ownership of ML systems points towards the GenAI Engineer profile, which encompasses building and deploying AI-powered applications.

job_tasks.justification: Phrases like 'Develop production-grade ML systems, from models to features and pipelines', 'Build readable and reusable code, applying code quality best practices and using standard libraries', 'Choose the right technology or coding methodology as well as refactor and simplify code when necessary', and 'Be responsible for business related data governance processes, the technical implementation and maintenance of data processing services and storage systems' indicate core software development activities necessary for building and deploying ML systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop production-grade ML systems, from models to features and pipelines, accounting for reliability, scalability, real-time requirements, monitoring and retraining.

job_tasks.justification: The emphasis on 'readable and reusable code, applying code quality best practices and using standard libraries' and 'Choose the right technology or coding methodology as well as refactor and simplify code when necessary' directly relates to software engineering principles.
job_tasks.phrase: Build readable and reusable code, applying code quality best practices and using standard libraries.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the engineering aspect of selecting appropriate technologies and methodologies, and the practice of code refactoring, which are fundamental to software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Choose the right technology or coding methodology as well as refactor and simplify code when necessary.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Take full ownership of your services end to end by actively monitoring the systems health, performance and business impact' points to the operational aspects of managing deployed systems, including monitoring and performance tracking, which is a key part of MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Take full ownership of your services end to end by actively monitoring the systems health, performance and business impact.

job_tasks.justification: This sentence covers responsibilities related to data governance, the implementation and maintenance of data processing services and storage systems, and ML governance processes, all of which fall under data engineering and management.
job_tasks.phrase: Be responsible for business related data governance processes, the technical implementation and maintenance of data processing services and storage systems, and the implementation and maintenance of ML governance processes.

job_tasks.justification: Evaluating architecture solutions based on 'business and technology requirements' demonstrates an understanding of how technical solutions align with business needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate possible architecture solutions taking into account the business and technology requirements.

job_tasks.justification: Setting and acting upon Service Level Objectives (SLOs) is a critical aspect of operations engineering and ensuring system reliability.
job_tasks.phrase: Set the relevant service level objectives SLOs and act accordingly when they are not met.

job_tasks.justification: This phrase combines software development practices ('readable and reusable code', 'right technologies and coding methodologies') with an understanding of the 'business area tools and product needs', indicating a blend of technical implementation and business context.
job_tasks.phrase: Build readable and reusable code, using the right technologies and coding methodologies applying knowledge of business area tools and product needs.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'implementation and maintenance of ML governance processes' implies managing the lifecycle and standards of ML models, which can involve data aspects and pipeline management.
job_tasks.phrase: implementation and maintenance of ML governance processes

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'technical implementation and maintenance of data processing services and storage systems' directly relates to building and maintaining the infrastructure for data.
job_tasks.phrase: technical implementation and maintenance of data processing services and storage systems

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'latest developments in ML/AI' implies staying current with and potentially applying new modeling techniques.
job_tasks.phrase: keeping up to date with the latest developments in ML/AI

job_tasks.justification: Sharing knowledge and participating in internal programs indicates a collaborative and communicative approach within the team.
job_tasks.phrase: sharing your knowledge and participating in our internal ML programs

job_tasks.justification: Coaching others and explaining advanced technical concepts in simpler terms is a direct indicator of strong communication skills.
job_tasks.phrase: Coach others through evidence and clear communication, explaining advanced technical concepts in simpler terms.

job_tasks.justification: Maintaining a 'highly cross-disciplinary perspective, solving issues by applying approaches and methods from across a variety of disciplines and related fields' highlights a broad problem-solving approach.
job_tasks.phrase: Maintain a highly cross-disciplinary perspective, solving issues by applying approaches and methods from across a variety of disciplines and related fields.

job_tasks.justification: Achieving mutually agreeable solutions through adaptability, clear communication, and active listening are core soft skills for collaboration.
job_tasks.phrase: Achieve mutually agreeable solutions by staying adaptable, communicating ideas in clear coherent language and practising active listening

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Continuously evolve your craft by keeping up to date with the latest developments in ML/AI and related technologies and upskilling on these, as needed' directly speaks to continuous learning and adaptability.
job_tasks.phrase: Continuously evolve your craft by keeping up to date with the latest developments in ML/AI and related technologies and upskilling on these, as needed.

Coach others through evidence and clear communication
explaining advanced technical concepts in simpler terms
solving issues by applying approaches and methods from across a variety of disciplines and related fields
